title: Most bills referred to committees but never leave

content.prompt: Most of the bills introduced in the House and the Senate are then

choices.label: passed by one chamber but not the other
passed by both chambers but vetoed by the President
referred to committee but never sent to the full Congress
voted down during the amendment stage of the floor debate

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
